name: .KTZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .KTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by Kahootz, an educational program that allows students to create and explore 3D worlds; saves a 3D scene and can include animation sequences; often used for creating small puzzles or games.

content: NOTE: The Kahootz software is no longer supported or available for download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
